Title: The Significant Other
Writer: Apple Cruz (story), Henry Concepcion (story), Florencio Romero (story), Enrique Ramos (screenplay), Jerry Gracio (screenplay)
Actors: Lovi Poe, Tom Rodriguez, Erich Gonzales, Dina Bonnevie
Plot: A neophyte model from a lowly working class background gets her big break and share top catwalk billing with her idol, a highbred fashion princess who is on the comeback trail after a ...
